summary:
This mod will add sex animations to get some Adult action in Skyrim.

Available Files:
- ASX - Spells (Triggers Masturbation & Sex Animations by Spells)
- ASX - Potions (Triggers Masturbation Animations with Potions)
- Loose NPC (18+) Animations

Available in the near future:
- ASX - Brothel
descriptionHtml:
[color=yellow][size=4][b]DISCLAIMER - READ FIRST[/b][/size][/color]

This is an adult 18+ xxx mod, just for the fun of it. If you dont like it, don't download it or even visit this page, but if you do, we hope you enjoy.

[color=red][size=4][b]ASX - Spells required mods[/b][/size][/color]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11811/?]Fores New Idles in Skyrim - FNIS[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?]SkyUI[/url][/size]
[size=2]Make sure that you [b]GenerateFNISforUsers.exe[/b] (comes with the FNIS mod) after an ASX installation / Skyrim Update / DLC Install (Like Dawnguard).[/size]

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[size=3][b][color=red]Recruiting:[/color][/b]Â Female voice actors with a good microphone. Contact [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3150894/?]RainOfChaos[/url] [/size]

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[color=yellow][size=5][b]NEWS[/b][/size][/color]

[b]Check the sticky in the comments (posts) section for the latest news.[/b]

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[color=yellow][size=5][b]ASX - Spells[/b][/size][/color]

[b][color=#FF6633]About[/color][/b]
This mod will add 4 spells to the game:
- Animate Selector - Select the animation to cast.
- Animate Player - Let's the player perform a single animation.
- Animate Person - Let's the target NPC perform a single animation (Can be cast on 10 different NPC's at once) or when a dual animation is selected it will perform the animation with the player.
- Animate Pair - Select a target NPC and another target NPC to perform a dual animation.

How to use:
- Select a single or dual animation with the 'Animate Selector' Spell, then use one of the other spells to activate the animation.

[b][color=#FF6633]Known Issues[/color][/b]
- Positioning of sex animations can be wrong, when not on a flat surface.
- Sex animations will not work on certain NPC's.
- Sometimes when the player is involved in an animation it will rotate with the camera rotation.
Quickfix:
1. Press and hold the 'f' key to freeze the players position.
2. Use the console command tfc. (If you use the tfc command, make sure that you have disabled it before the animation ends, otherwise you can't use spells / weapons anymore. For the dual animation with the player you will get a warning that 5 seconds is left.)

[b][color=#FF6633]Required mods[/color][/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11811]FNIS Latest Behaviour Files (For the animations)[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863]SkyUI (For the mod configuration menu)[/url]

[b][color=#FF6633]Supported DLC's[/color][/b]
The voice sounds should work with the DLC's Dawnguard and Dragonborn.

[b][color=#FF6633]Installation[/color][/b]

Recommended:
- Install the required mods.
- Use the Nexus Mod Manager for installing this mod.

Manual:
- Install the required mods.
- Copy all the included files (Except for the file 'ASX_Spells_Readme.txt') into your 'Skyrim/Data' folder.
- Activate the 'ASX_Spells.esp' file.
- Run GenerateFNISforUsers.exe (See FNIS mod for instructions)

[b][color=#FF6633]Uninstalling[/color][/b]

Recommended:
- Use the Nexus Mod Manager

Manual:
Delete from your 'Data' folder:

- The folder '\Meshes\actors\character\animations\ASX'.

- The file 'ASX_Spells.esp'.
- The file 'ASX_Spells.bsa'.
- The file '\Meshes\actors\character\behaviors\FNIS_ASX_Behavior.hkx'

- The file '\Scripts'\ASX_AF_Idles.pex'
- The file '\Scripts'\ASX_Animation_FrameworkQuest.pex'
- The file '\Scripts'\ASX_S_Effect1_Script.pex'
- The file '\Scripts'\ASX_S_Effect2_Script.pex'
- The file '\Scripts'\ASX_S_EffectPair_Script.pex'
- The file '\Scripts'\ASX_S_EffectPlayer_Script.pex'
- The file '\Scripts'\ASX_S_MCMQuest.pex'
- The file '\Scripts'\ASX_S_Quest_Script.pex'
- The file '\Scripts'\ASX_S_Spell_Script.pex'

If you installed custom voices then delete this folder to:
- The folder '\Sound\Voice\ASX_Spells.esp'.

[b][color=#FF6633]SkyUI Mod configuration settings[/color][/b]
For this mod you can configure multiple things with the MCM of SkyUI. It is available on game start when the mod is enabled.

[b]Auto remove[/b]
- Clothes player: Enable to automatically remove player clothes with Animate Player
- Clothes NPC: Enable to automatically remove NPC clothes with Animate Person or Animate Pair (Pair target 1)
- Clothes NPC2: Enable to automatically remove NPC clothes with Animate Pair (Pair target 2)

[b]Times[/b]
- Player single time: Set an animation time for Animate Player
- Player dual time: Set an animation time for Animate Person dual animation with player
- NPC single time: Set an animation time for Animate Person single animation
- NPC dual time: Set an animation time for Animate Pair

[b]Voices[/b]
- Male player voice: Set the voice type of the player with gender male used with Animate Player or Animate Person
- Female player voice: Set the voice type of the player with gender female used with Animate Player or Animate Person

- NPC dual male voice: Set the voice type of the NPC with gender male used with Animate Person with player
- NPC dual female voice: Set the voice type of the player with gender female used with Animate Person with player

- NPC male voice: Set the voice type of the NPC with gender male used with Animate Person.
- NPC female voice: Set the voice type of the NPC with gender male used with Animate Person.

- Pair target 1 male voice: Set the voice type of target NPC 1 with gender male used with Animate Pair.
- Pair target 1 female voice: Set the voice type of target NPC 1 with gender female used with Animate Pair.
- Pair target 2 male voice: Set the voice type of target NPC 2 with gender male used with Animate Pair.
- Pair target 2 female voice: Set the voice type of target NPC 2 with gender female used with Animate Pair.

[b]Misc[/b]
- Auto scaling: Scales the characters that are doing the animations to te same height.
- Switch sex positions: Turn the characters around in a sex animation. So the giver becomes the receiver and the receiver becomes the giver.

[b][color=#FF6633]Custom voice types[/color][/b]
If you have a mod that uses a custom voice type, and you want the NPC(s) in that mod to make the erotic sounds of this mod.
Then you can do that pretty easily. To explain how to do this, is by using an example.

Example mod: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54527/?]Sofia - The Funny Fully Voiced Follower[/url] by John Jarvis and Christine Slagman
Note: This mod has it's own nude body skins in which the follower has a bikini on. To remove that, use this mod: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55300/?]Sofia Customizer[/url] by Adrianus92

From now on if I talk about 'this mod', I'm talking about the Sofia mod.
1. Get a hold on the folder name for the voice type that's being used.
- In this mod everything is packed in a BSA file in the 'Skyrim\Data' folder. So grab a BSA unpacker or browser (just search on nexus).
- Open the BSA file 'SofiaFollower.bsa'
- Look for a filepath that starts with: 'sound\voice\*mod esp name*\' so in this example search for 'sound\voice\sofiafollower.esp\'
- Now you have found the filepath: 'sound\voice\sofiafollower.esp\jjsofiavoicetype\' (There's also some others, but that's not the voice you need)
- The part behind the 'mod esp name' folder tells you the voicetype. So for this example the voicetype is: 'jjsofiavoicetype'.

2. Create a folder for the voice files.
- You only have to create this folder the first time. For every additional voicetype you can add a folder in it.
- Create the folder 'ASX_Spells.esp' into the 'Skyrim\Data\Sound\Voice\' folder. (Only first time)
- Create the voice type folder with the exact voicetype name in it, so create the folder 'jjsofiavoicetype'. So you get the path: 'Skyrim\Data\Sound\Voice\ASX_Spells.esp\jjsofiavoicetype\'

3. Determine for which gender(s) you need the voice files and download them from the downloads section under optional files.
- The voice pack names are: 'ASX - Spells v2.x - Female voices' and 'ASX - Spells v2.x - Male voices'

4. Unpack the voice files into the folder you just created in step 3. So unpack them into the folder: 'Skyrim\Data\Sound\Voice\ASX_Spells.esp\jjsofiavoicetype\'

5. Launch the game and have fun!

[color=red][size=3][b]For further info, read the readme.[/b][/size][/color]

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[color=yellow][size=5][b]FAQ[/b][/size][/color]

[b][color=#FF6633]No sounds[/color][/b]
If everything works except the sound, then make sure you have Skyrim at least updated to 1.5.26.0.

[b][color=#FF6633]No Spells or Potions - Check if .esp file is active / Activate - Deactivate .esp file[/color][/b]
To make sure that .esp files are activated and are used by the game, you need to check if the menu item 'Data Files' on the launch screen of Skyrim is clickable and no longer greyed out.
If you can't click the 'Data Files' menu item, then this means that loose .esp files aren't activated ingame. To activate the 'Data Files' menu item, follow this topic: [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/464159-cant-open-data-files-at-launcher]Forum Topic - Fix Data Files Activation[/url]

After you have this working, you can either check or uncheck the files in:

Skyrim Launcher:
- Click on 'Data Files'
- Check / Uncheck the .esp files

Nexus Mod Manager (NMM):
- Go To 'Plugins' tab
- Check / Uncheck the .esp files


[b][color=#FF6633]Paralyzed like a puppet or just staying idle after activating a spell or taking a potion?[/color][/b]
When this problem occurs it can have multiple causes:

1. You haven't installed FNIS latest behavior files as is required for animations to work. You can get them here: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11811]Fores New Idles in Skyrim - FNIS[/url].

If you are using FNIS v3 or higher, then run GenerateFNISforUsers.exe (comes with FNIS), after an ASX installation / Skyrim Update / DLC Install (Like Dawnguard)

2. You have mods that are incompatible with ASX mods or use a tool that's incompatible. Known problem generators: Animated Prostitution v1.9, Joshs Skyrim Behavior File Patcher (or any mod that uses this). This mod and tool corrupts the behavior files of FNIS and therefore is incompatible.


[b][color=#FF6633]Best Results Female animation[/color][/b]
Use [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666]Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE-[/url]
Set the Weight sliders all the way down.
If the animation clips, make sure your character has her weight sliders all the way down using console "showracemenu" (or some other setting you can find).

[b][color=#FF6633]How to get NPC's naked[/color][/b]

Option 1: Use one of the options in the Mod configuration menu

Option 2: Pickpocket the NPC's clothes.

Option 3:
- Bring up Console (~)
- Click on the NPC (Make sure that you see the identification number on screen, this means that you have selected the NPC)
- Type 'unequipall', without the quotes
- Press Enter
- Close the Console (~)

Option 4: Use the 'Let's get naked!' sentence through dialogue from the: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11770]Lets get naked[/url] mod by voidtarget.

Option 5: Use the Strip spell from the: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9341]New Spell - Strip NPCs[/url] mod by Anon1Anon.
